product_name: Hiking the California Coastal Trail Volume 2: Monterey to Mexico
long_description: Explore the coast from remote beaches to quaint villages, coastal wetlands to rugged mountains, wilderness areas to gorgeous urban waterfronts. Lorentzen, Bob and Nichols, Richard. Softcover; 368 pages; 65 two-color illustrated maps; black-and-white photos. Co-published by Bored Feet Press and Coastwalk; copyright 2000. 83 accessible trail sections from 2 1/2 to 27 3/4 miles in length. 6 sections suitable for backpacking in Big Sur, Santa Monica Mountains and at Point Sal. 64 State Parks and Beaches; 86 county and city parks and preserves; auto and walk-in campgrounds, lodgings and hostels en route. 32 feature articles on coastal attractions, history and issues.
short_description: Explore the coast from remote beaches to quaint villages, coastal wetlands to rugged mountains, wilderness areas to gorgeous urban waterfronts.
